channel.title: Recharge pray, command
channel.description:
can someone give me please?
or a command that spawns object id 408.
thanks,

item.dc:creator: @white_merlin white merlin
item.description:
@white_merlin wrote:

right u ohh mi i no how to do go to charater on file and say ur name was " cheese" then u need to find the skill number pray i not sure but life is 3 so eg here is right u see the first 0 dnt edit the 99 is the skill and the 38888250 is the xp right to get unlimited life u do , u see the 99 the lv change that to 999 dnt do higher or it no wrk. But when u do then try to login u just get black screen it mean u cant do it. dnt wry though u ave not lost source all u do is go bk and remove the 999 to 99 bk to normal but u wnt be able to do it! iwill show u wat it should look like on charater skill 3 this is the life 1!
[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0(here dnt edit) 99(this is lv(edit this) ) 38888250(dnt change this , this is xp)

item.title: Recharge pray, command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

ugh, nvm guys.

i already got object coded into my client, i just wanted a command so i dont always have to spawn the alter from where i am or go to my home and recharge.

Read full topic

item.title: Recharge pray, command
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

if(command.startsWith("addobj") && playerRights > 2){ int objid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; appendToObjSpawn(objid, absx, absy); sM("Object added."); }

if that didnt work, try this

if(command.startsWith("object") && playerRights > 2){ int obj = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, obj, 0, 10); sM("You spawn object number "+command.substring(7)+"."); }

now where ever u r ingame type ::addobject 408 if u used the first code, and if u used the second ::object 408

Read full topic
